divs: Sighting Detailswas fishing at the lake when we seen the light.it looked liked a star moving right at us.slow was not moving fast no sound went over our heads looks like a triangle now its bright led looking light. it slowly moved out out of sight
Summary: look like a star that was moving.when it got closer to us it look liked a triangle shape made no noise
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Taylorsville
There were no other sightings in Taylorsville on or around August 14th 2011
